comment.body: Post Lenna in the wepb format, please.
I see a cloudflare fan here.
Read this article written by Vitalik Buterin [The Meaning of Decentralization](https://medium.com/@VitalikButerin/the-meaning-of-decentralization-a0c92b76a274)

* **ZeroNet** is architecturally, politically, logically decentralized.
* **Zites** and hubs are architecturally decentralized and (mostly) centralized in the political and logical axes.
* **Merger Sites** are also partially decentralized in the political and logical axes.
What if... Big Brother is only watching anime?
